de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.formatter

Interface Formatter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HtmlFormatter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseFormatter, FeedFormatter, PostFormatter, SiteFormatter, SiteMapFormatter

    public interface Formatter
    Implementations can format them self to an string with specific encoding.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String format()
      Formats the object.
      void setEncoding(String encoding)
      Set the site encoding.

        Formats the object.
        Returns:
        never null
        Throws:
        IOException - on any I/O error
        freemarker.template.TemplateException - on any template error

        Parameters:
